sentences.sContent: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.sCn: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.sContent: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.sCn: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.sContent: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.sCn: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.sContent: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.sCn: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.sContent: ...there’s little time left for leisure activities for many Americans...
...In a UK survey on leisure time activities...
...who will be around for you to share your leisure time with...
...The most popular leisure activity in Britain is going for a walk...
...They were all luxury hotels in the leisure sector...

phrases.pCn: 休闲中心；体育活动中心

trans.tranOther: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy
